titles.title: A bill to expedite certain California land exchanges between the Secretary of the Interior and the Nature Conservancy.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 6/29/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to proceed with land exchanges between the Nature Conservancy and the Bureau of Land Management to complete the Coachella Valley preserve, California.
